name: TOWER DEFENSE IDK WHAT TO CALL IT
name_original: TOWER DEFENSE IDK WHAT TO CALL IT
description:
A pixel art-style tower defense game that... we really don't know what to call.

Fight waves of enemies in a classic tower defense game with unique towers and amazing gameplay that will keep you playing for hours!

Planned Platforms: Windows, Linux, Mac, Android, iOS

Current Confirmed Platforms: Windows, Linux, Mac

Current Released Platforms: Windows, Linux, Mac, Android

Game will receive updates throughout release time.

CREDITS:

dumbprogrammer - Laser and Hyperlaser tower art, programming, OST 2*

Saturn - All art, OST 1

AZALI and Crow - MECHANICAL GOD

*OST 2  not in game.
